entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -6.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
